gui.familiar_friends.author: Author(s):
entity.familiar_friends.chicken_companio: Grants the player passive slow falling while the player is on the ground, which lasts for 2 seconds when in the air.
entity.familiar_friends.iron_golem_compa: damages attackers or hostile mobs while also sending them flying into the air (causing additional fall damage).
entity.familiar_friends.navi_companion.d: When the Player approaches a vein of xyz (modify later), Navi will alert the player, and will increase their pitch the closer the player gets to the vein.
